pr_title: RM16428: display advise message when batch has been already launch wi…

timeline.bodyText: Simply use == (in groovy, == is the same as  equals() in java) to check if two localdates are equals.
timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -81,12 +81,13 @@
 
 	<!-- ACTION ATTRS -->
 	<action-attrs name="action-supplychain-batch-attrs-show-label">
-		<attribute name="hidden" expr="eval: !(moveDate && batchList && batchList?.find{it.startDate.month == __date__.month && it.startDate.year == __date__.year} != null)" for="adviseUser"/>
+		<attribute name="hidden" expr="eval: !(moveDate && batchList && batchList?.find{it.moveDate?.day == moveDate.day && it.moveDate?.month == moveDate.month && it.moveDate?.year == moveDate.year && it.accountingCutOffTypeSelect == accountingCutOffTypeSelect} != null)" for="adviseUser"/>

timeline.message: RM16428: display advise message when batch has been already launch with the same move date
